title: Song festival
creator_credit: Castle Films, Universal Pictures and Edward Cline
brief_description: Selection of songs from the film “What’s cookin’” (Universal) including ‘I’ll pray for you’ sung by the Andrews Sisters with Woody Herman and his Orchestra, ‘Il bacio’ featuring Gloria Jean and ‘Amen’ with Jane Frayee.
